Package com.simulator.model

Class House

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.model.House
public class House
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the house within the simulation, uses Singleton pattern (creational pattern)

    • addEntrywaySensor

      public int addEntrywaySensor​(java.lang.String newName, java.lang.String roomName, java.lang.String targetName)
      Adds an entryway sensor to an entryway of the house
      Parameters:
      newName - the new uniquely identifying name for the motion sensor
      roomName - the name of the room the entryway is a part of
      targetName - the name of the entry way the sensor is to be placed on
      Returns:
      an integer representing the success or failure of the request a return value of 0 represents success a return value of 1 represents failure

      Returns:
